name: MAYA (GAL Ramirez)
description:
A Top-Down Dual Stick Shooter Set inside a space station within a simulation Room, destroy all targets to get the Highest Score Possible preventing the AI to take Over the Memory space of the simulation

Prepare you character to become part of the fleet destroyers Squadrons by Participating in A Test inside a simulation Station, destroy all the targets and fulfill the mission before the AI Enemies Overtake the Size of the Memory of the simulation making it to crash.
